quiz.question: trustworthy ______
quiz.explanation: 值得信赖的, 值得信赖的朋友. She proved to be a trustworthy friend in times of need. 她在需要时证明是值得信赖的朋友。

quiz.question: leaky ____
quiz.explanation: 漏水的, 漏水的屋顶. The leaky roof needed immediate repair. 漏水的屋顶需要立即修理。

quiz.question: peaky ____
quiz.explanation: 憔悴的, 憔悴的样子. She had a peaky look after being ill. 她生病后有憔悴的样子。

quiz.question: squeaky _____
quiz.explanation: 吱吱作响的, 吱吱作响的鞋子. His new squeaky shoes annoyed everyone. 他新的吱吱作响的鞋子惹恼了每个人。

quiz.question: croaky _____
quiz.explanation: 沙哑的, 沙哑的声音. The singer had a croaky voice from the cold. 歌手因感冒而有沙哑的声音。

quiz.question: dicky _____
quiz.explanation: 不舒服的, 不舒服的肚子. He had a dicky tummy after eating bad food. 吃了坏食物后他有不舒服的肚子。

quiz.question: panicky ________
quiz.explanation: 恐慌的, 恐慌的反应. Her panicky reaction made things worse. 她恐慌的反应使事情变得更糟。

quiz.question: stocky _____
quiz.explanation: 粗壮的, 粗壮的体格. The wrestler had a stocky build. 这位摔跤手有粗壮的体格。

quiz.question: cheeky ____
quiz.explanation: 厚颜无耻的, 厚颜无耻的笑容. The child gave a cheeky grin. 孩子露出厚颜无耻的笑容。

quiz.question: spiky ____
quiz.explanation: 尖刺状的, 尖刺状的头发. The punk rocker had bright spiky hair. 朋克摇滚歌手有明亮的尖刺状头发。

quiz.question: bulky _______
quiz.explanation: 笨重的, 笨重的包裹. The bulky package was difficult to carry. 笨重的包裹很难携带。

quiz.question: sulky _______
quiz.explanation: 生闷气的, 生闷气的沉默. The child's sulky silence lasted for hours. 孩子生闷气的沉默持续了几个小时。

quiz.question: hanky _____
quiz.explanation: 欺骗, 欺骗行为. There was some hanky-panky going on in the office. 办公室里发生了一些欺骗行为。

quiz.question: lanky ____
quiz.explanation: 瘦长的, 瘦长的青少年. The lanky teenager was growing fast. 瘦长的青少年长得很快。

quiz.question: manky _____
quiz.explanation: 肮脏的, 肮脏的毛巾. The hotel had manky towels that needed washing. 酒店有需要清洗的肮脏毛巾。

quiz.question: cranky _______
quiz.explanation: 脾气暴躁的, 脾气暴躁的幼儿. The cranky toddler needed a nap. 脾气暴躁的幼儿需要小睡。

quiz.question: spooky _____
quiz.explanation: 诡异的, 诡异的故事. The children told spooky stories around the campfire. 孩子们在篝火旁讲诡异的故事。

quiz.question: murky _____
quiz.explanation: 浑浊的, 浑浊的水. The murky water made it impossible to see. 浑浊的水使人无法看清。

quiz.question: dusky ___
quiz.explanation: 昏暗的, 昏暗的天空. The dusky sky signaled approaching night. 昏暗的天空预示着夜幕降临。

quiz.question: scaly ____
quiz.explanation: 有鳞的, 有鳞的皮肤. The reptile had dry scaly skin. 爬行动物有干燥的有鳞皮肤。

quiz.question: ____ dependably
quiz.explanation: 可靠地, 可靠地工作. The old car continued to work dependably. 这辆旧车继续可靠地工作。

quiz.question: invariably ____
quiz.explanation: 总是, 总是真实的. His predictions were invariably true. 他的预测总是真实的。

quiz.question: admirably _______
quiz.explanation: 令人钦佩地, 令人钦佩地处理. She admirably handled the difficult situation. 她令人钦佩地处理了困难的情况。

quiz.question: unaccountably ______
quiz.explanation: 莫名其妙地, 莫名其妙地缺席. He was unaccountably absent from the meeting. 他莫名其妙地缺席了会议。

quiz.question: knobbly _____
quiz.explanation: 多节的, 多节的膝盖. The old man had knobbly knees from arthritis. 老人因关节炎而有多节的膝盖。

quiz.question: bubbly ___________
quiz.explanation: 活泼的, 活泼的个性. She had a bubbly personality that everyone loved. 她有每个人都喜欢的活泼个性。

quiz.question: stubbly _____
quiz.explanation: 胡茬的, 胡茬的胡须. He had a stubbly beard after not shaving. 他因没刮胡子而有胡茬的胡须。

quiz.question: audibly ____
quiz.explanation: 听得见地, 听得见地倒抽气. The audience would audibly gasp at the reveal. 观众会在揭示时听得见地倒抽气。

quiz.question: ____ nimbly
quiz.explanation: 敏捷地, 敏捷地移动. The gymnast could move nimbly across the beam. 体操运动员能在平衡木上敏捷地移动。

quiz.question: ______ numbly
quiz.explanation: 麻木地, 麻木地回答. She would answer numbly in shock. 她会在震惊中麻木地回答。

quiz.question: _______ superbly
quiz.explanation: 极好地, 极好地表演. The orchestra would perform superbly. 管弦乐队会极好地表演。

quiz.question: cuddly ___
quiz.explanation: 可爱的, 可爱的玩具. The child hugged her cuddly toy bear. 孩子拥抱她可爱的玩具熊。

quiz.question: lopsidedly _____
quiz.explanation: 不对称地, 不对称地建造. The shed was lopsidedly built and leaned to one side. 棚屋不对称地建造,向一侧倾斜。

quiz.question: ____ doggedly
quiz.explanation: 顽强地, 顽强地工作. He continued to work doggedly despite setbacks. 尽管遇到挫折,他继续顽强地工作。

quiz.question: _____ crookedly
quiz.explanation: 歪曲地, 歪曲地微笑. He would smile crookedly at the joke. 他会对笑话歪曲地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ resignedly
quiz.explanation: 顺从地, 顺从地点头. She would nod resignedly in acceptance. 她会顺从地点头接受。

quiz.question: _____ unrestrainedly
quiz.explanation: 无拘束地, 无拘束地大笑. Children laugh unrestrainedly at silly jokes. 孩子们对愚蠢的笑话无拘束地大笑。

quiz.question: ____ unconcernedly
quiz.explanation: 漠不关心地, 漠不关心地看. He would look unconcernedly at the chaos. 他会漠不关心地看着混乱。

quiz.question: ___ composedly
quiz.explanation: 镇定地, 镇定地坐. She would sit composedly during the crisis. 她会在危机中镇定地坐着。

quiz.question: _____ heatedly
quiz.explanation: 激烈地, 激烈地争论. They would argue heatedly about politics. 他们会激烈地争论政治。

quiz.question: ____ dejectedly
quiz.explanation: 沮丧地, 沮丧地叹气. He would sigh dejectedly after losing. 输了之后他会沮丧地叹气。

quiz.question: ____ spiritedly
quiz.explanation: 精神抖擞地, 精神抖擞地玩. Children play spiritedly in the park. 孩子们在公园里精神抖擞地玩。

quiz.question: ____ dispiritedly
quiz.explanation: 垂头丧气地, 垂头丧气地走. The defeated team walked dispiritedly off the field. 战败的球队垂头丧气地走下球场。

quiz.question: ___ contentedly
quiz.explanation: 满足地, 满足地吃. The cat would eat contentedly from its bowl. 猫会满足地从碗里吃东西。

quiz.question: ___ pointedly
quiz.explanation: 尖锐地, 尖锐地说. She would say pointedly what she thought. 她会尖锐地说出她的想法。

quiz.question: admittedly ____
quiz.explanation: 诚然, 诚然真实的. It was admittedly true that he made a mistake. 诚然他犯了一个错误是真实的。

quiz.question: ____ perplexedly
quiz.explanation: 困惑地, 困惑地看. He would look perplexedly at the instructions. 他会困惑地看着说明。

quiz.question: _____ fixedly
quiz.explanation: 凝视地, 凝视地盯着. She would stare fixedly at the painting. 她会凝视地盯着画作。

quiz.question: _____ dazedly
quiz.explanation: 茫然地, 茫然地回答. He would reply dazedly after the accident. 事故后他会茫然地回答。

quiz.question: ___ idly
quiz.explanation: 闲散地, 闲散地坐. Don't just sit idly while work needs doing. 当需要工作时不要只是闲散地坐着。

quiz.question: _____ rigidly
quiz.explanation: 僵硬地, 僵硬地站. Soldiers stand rigidly at attention. 士兵们僵硬地立正站着。

quiz.question: _____ timidly
quiz.explanation: 胆怯地, 胆怯地说话. The shy child would speak timidly to adults. 害羞的孩子会胆怯地对成年人说话。

quiz.question: ____ languidly
quiz.explanation: 慵懒地, 慵懒地移动. She would move languidly in the heat. 她会在炎热中慵懒地移动。

quiz.question: ____ avidly
quiz.explanation: 热切地, 热切地阅读. He would read avidly every book he could find. 他会热切地阅读他能找到的每本书。

quiz.question: _____ baldly
quiz.explanation: 直截了当地, 直截了当地陈述. He would state the facts baldly without emotion. 他会不带感情地直截了当陈述事实。

quiz.question: _____ blandly
quiz.explanation: 平淡地, 平淡地微笑. She would smile blandly at his jokes. 她会对他的笑话平淡地微笑。

quiz.question: ___ unfriendly
quiz.explanation: 不友好地, 不友好地行动. He didn't mean to act unfriendly. 他不是有意不友好地行动。

quiz.question: spindly ____
quiz.explanation: 细长的, 细长的腿. The colt had long spindly legs. 小马有长长的细长腿。

quiz.question: _____ soundly
quiz.explanation: 酣畅地, 酣畅地睡. The baby would sleep soundly through the night. 婴儿会整夜酣畅地睡。

quiz.question: _____ inwardly
quiz.explanation: 内心地, 内心地思考. She would think inwardly about her problems. 她会内心地思考她的问题。

quiz.question: ____ haphazardly
quiz.explanation: 随意地, 随意地工作. Don't work haphazardly; make a plan. 不要随意地工作;制定一个计划。

quiz.question: scarcely ___
quiz.explanation: 几乎不, 几乎没有. There was scarcely any food left. 几乎没有食物剩下。

quiz.question: ______ snidely
quiz.explanation: 讥讽地, 讥讽地评论. He would remark snidely about others. 他会讥讽地评论别人。

quiz.question: _____ steely
quiz.explanation: 钢铁般地, 钢铁般地盯着. She gave him a cold steely stare. 她给了他冰冷的钢铁般的盯视。

quiz.question: ______ savagely
quiz.explanation: 野蛮地, 野蛮地攻击. The dog would attack savagely when threatened. 当受到威胁时,狗会野蛮地攻击。

quiz.question: _________ lamely
quiz.explanation: 无力地, 无力地道歉. He would apologize lamely for his mistake. 他会为自己的错误无力地道歉。

quiz.question: ___ supremely
quiz.explanation: 极度地, 极度地获胜. The champion would win supremely in every match. 冠军会在每场比赛中极度地获胜。

quiz.question: _____ serenely
quiz.explanation: 平静地, 平静地微笑. She would smile serenely despite the chaos. 尽管混乱,她会平静地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ squarely
quiz.explanation: 正面地, 正面地站立. Stand squarely and face your problems. 正面站立并面对你的问题。

quiz.question: ______ sorely
quiz.explanation: 严重地, 严重地受苦. The villagers would suffer sorely from famine. 村民会因饥荒而严重受苦。

quiz.question: _______ tensely
quiz.explanation: 紧张地, 紧张地呼吸. She would breathe tensely awaiting the results. 她会紧张地呼吸等待结果。

quiz.question: _____ hoarsely
quiz.explanation: 嘶哑地, 嘶哑地说话. He would speak hoarsely after shouting. 喊叫后他会嘶哑地说话。

quiz.question: _____ delicately
quiz.explanation: 精巧地, 精巧地触摸. She would touch the antique vase delicately. 她会精巧地触摸古董花瓶。

quiz.question: ____ sedately
quiz.explanation: 稳重地, 稳重地走. The elderly couple would walk sedately in the park. 老年夫妇会在公园里稳重地走。

quiz.question: ____ disconsolately
quiz.explanation: 悲伤地, 悲伤地哭泣. She would weep disconsolately after the loss. 失去后她会悲伤地哭泣。

quiz.question: ___ affectionately
quiz.explanation: 深情地, 深情地拥抱. They would hug affectionately when reunited. 重聚时他们会深情地拥抱。

quiz.question: ___ mutely
quiz.explanation: 默默地, 默默地坐. She would sit mutely throughout the meeting. 她会在整个会议中默默地坐着。

quiz.question: _____ grotesquely
quiz.explanation: 怪诞地, 怪诞地笑. The villain would laugh grotesquely. 反派会怪诞地笑。

quiz.question: ______ brusquely
quiz.explanation: 粗暴地, 粗暴地回答. He would answer brusquely when annoyed. 当恼怒时他会粗暴地回答。

quiz.question: _____ gravely
quiz.explanation: 严肃地, 严肃地说话. The doctor would speak gravely about the diagnosis. 医生会严肃地谈论诊断。

quiz.question: _____ evasively
quiz.explanation: 含糊其辞地, 含糊其辞地回答. He would reply evasively to direct questions. 他会对直接问题含糊其辞地回答。

quiz.question: ___ compulsively
quiz.explanation: 强迫性地, 强迫性地购买. She would buy compulsively when stressed. 当有压力时她会强迫性地购买。

quiz.question: _____ convulsively
quiz.explanation: 痉挛地, 痉挛地颤抖. His body would shake convulsively with sobs. 他的身体会因抽泣而痉挛地颤抖。

quiz.question: ____ apprehensively
quiz.explanation: 忧虑地, 忧虑地等待. They would wait apprehensively for the news. 他们会忧虑地等待消息。

quiz.question: ______ impassively
quiz.explanation: 冷漠地, 冷漠地倾听. The judge would listen impassively to arguments. 法官会冷漠地倾听论点。

quiz.question: ___ interrogatively
quiz.explanation: 疑问地, 疑问地询问. She would ask interrogatively about the details. 她会疑问地询问细节。

quiz.question: ___ tentatively
quiz.explanation: 试探性地, 试探性地点头. He would nod tentatively in agreement. 他会试探性地点头同意。

quiz.question: ___ instinctively
quiz.explanation: 本能地, 本能地行动. Animals act instinctively to survive. 动物本能地行动以生存。

quiz.question: ___ plaintively
quiz.explanation: 哀怨地, 哀怨地哭泣. The child would cry plaintively for attention. 孩子会哀怨地哭泣寻求关注。

quiz.question: ______ furtively
quiz.explanation: 偷偷地, 偷偷地瞥一眼. He would glance furtively at his watch. 他会偷偷地瞥一眼手表。

quiz.question: _____ stiffly
quiz.explanation: 僵硬地, 僵硬地站立. The guard would stand stiffly at his post. 卫兵会在他的岗位上僵硬地站立。

quiz.question: ___ gruffly
quiz.explanation: 粗声粗气地, 粗声粗气地说. The old man would say gruffly to leave him alone. 老人会粗声粗气地说让他独处。

quiz.question: ____ straggly
quiz.explanation: 凌乱的, 凌乱的头发. She had long straggly hair that needed brushing. 她有需要梳理的长凌乱头发。

quiz.question: wriggly ____
quiz.explanation: 扭动的, 扭动的虫子. The wriggly worm crawled through the soil. 扭动的虫子在土壤中爬行。

quiz.question: squiggly ____
quiz.explanation: 弯弯曲曲的, 弯弯曲曲的线. The child drew a squiggly line across the page. 孩子在纸上画了一条弯弯曲曲的线。

quiz.question: wiggly _____
quiz.explanation: 摇晃的, 摇晃的牙齿. The child had a wiggly tooth that would soon fall out. 孩子有一颗很快就会掉的摇晃牙齿。

quiz.question: gangly _____
quiz.explanation: 瘦长的, 瘦长的年轻人. The gangly youth was still growing into his height. 瘦长的年轻人还在长高。

quiz.question: _____ convincingly
quiz.explanation: 令人信服地, 令人信服地争论. The lawyer would argue convincingly for his client. 律师会为他的客户令人信服地争论。

quiz.question: ___ piercingly
quiz.explanation: 刺耳地, 刺耳地哭. The baby would cry piercingly when hungry. 婴儿饿时会刺耳地哭。

quiz.question: exceedingly ____
quiz.explanation: 极其, 极其罕见. Such opportunities are exceedingly rare. 这样的机会极其罕见。
